  • Method Details

    • getUserByOidcid

      Optional<User> getUserByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves an optional user by OIDC ID.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the OIDC ID of the user
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, or empty otherwise

    • getGraphByUuid

      Optional<Graph> getGraphByUuid(String uuid)
      Retrieves a graph by its UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the graph
      Returns:
      an optional containing the graph if found, or empty if not found

    • getGraphsByOidcid

      List<Map<String,Object>> getGraphsByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves users' associated graphs by OIDC ID.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the OIDC ID of the user
      Returns:
      a list of maps containing user information and associated graphs

    • createAndBindGraph

      Graph createAndBindGraph(GraphCreateDTO graphCreateDTO, org.neo4j.driver.Transaction tx)
      Creates and binds a new graph using the provided DTO.
      Parameters:
      graphCreateDTO - the DTO containing details to create a new graph
      tx - the Neo4j transaction
      Returns:
      the created graph

    • getNodeUuidsByRelatedGraphUuids

      List<String> getNodeUuidsByRelatedGraphUuids(List<String> uuids)
      Retrieves the UUIDs of nodes related to a list of graph UUIDs.
      Parameters:
      uuids - the list of UUIDs of graphs
      Returns:
      the list of UUIDs of nodes
